Articles.Content:
So I just bought the full game and downloaded the remix pack of Sunday Punch and the other pack combined (I forget the name) is there somewhere where I can get the descriptions of how to use all the pieces given to me (Like satellites, and the adapter pieces)? Im having a tad of difficulty putting them all together to form something great. 

So far Ive managed to get a rocket up and orbiting Kerbin, my next goal is to make one that is multi stage that orbits or lands on the Mun.

Any other great tips would be appreciated!! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hello and welcome to the forums!

[NovaPunch](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4180.0) would be the pack you have.

The [Spacecraft Exchange](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?board=15.0) and [How to...](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?board=10.0) subforums are pretty useful. They\'ve got methods and ships that can get you to the mun and back, so they\'re good references.
Well what about tips as far as using all the crazy couplers that come with. I may un install until I can make a mun shot with out all of this stuff!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

So I took out NovaPunch for a while and did the basics, a simple 3 stage rocket at first and then that branched off, I now have to rockets in orbit around Kerbin, now I am trying to work on getting one that can go to the Mun, any helpful tips??
